definitions: the condition of lacking the power of hearing or having impaired hearing

examples.text: the baby is at risk of being born with profound deafness
loud music is a cause of deafness

shortDefinitions: condition of lacking power of hearing or having impaired hearing

definitions: the state of being unwilling or unable to hear or pay attention to something

examples.text: the deafness shown by political leaders
a worrying example of deafness to human rights concerns

shortDefinitions: state of being unwilling or unable to hear or pay attention to something
